dcterms:creator: J. Stallkamp
M. Schlipsing
J. Salmen
C. Igel
dcterms:description: The GTSDB dataset contains natural traffic scenes recorded in various weather conditions and types of roads, including urban, highway, and rural settings. It includes 900 full images comprising 1206 traffic signs, split into a training set of 600 images and a test set of 300 images. The dataset features 43 classes of traffic signs, which are evaluated based on their detection performance.
dcterms:title: German Traffic Sign Detection Benchmark (GTSDB)
